Projects.Name: Amazon.Lambda.RuntimeSupport
ChangelogMessages: Add support for parameterized logging method with exception to global logger LambdaLogger in Amazon.Lambda.Core

Projects.Name: Amazon.Lambda.Core
ChangelogMessages: Added log level version of the static logging functions on Amazon.Lambda.Core.LambdaLogger

Projects.Name: Amazon.Lambda.Logging.AspNetCore
ChangelogMessages: Change build target from .NET Standard 2.0 to .NET 6 and NET 8 to match Amazon.Lambda.AspNetCoreServer

Projects.Name: Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities
ChangelogMessages: Update Amazon.Lambda.TestUtitlies to have implementation of the newer logging methods
Change build target from .NET Standard 2.0 to .NET 6 and NET 8 to match Amazon.Lambda.AspNetCoreServer
